gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.wave

Class SliceWaveRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.FrameRenderer
      • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.wave.SliceWaveRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer, Transformer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinimumWaveRenderer, MinuteMarkingWaveRenderer

    public class SliceWaveRenderer
extends FrameRenderer
    A renderer for slice of wave time series.
    Author:
    Dan Cervelli
